channel.title: Not Exists on Alessandro Lacava
channel.description: Recent content in Not Exists on Alessandro Lacava

item.title: NOT IN vs. NOT EXISTS when NULL values are involved
item.description: NOT IN does not behave as you would expect when NULL values are involved. Suppose you have the following tables: CD_FIELD DS_FIELD 1 ALPHA 2 BETA TABLE_A CD_FIELD DS_FIELD 1 GAMMA NULL DELTA TABLE_B Now try the following query: SELECT * FROM table_a a WHERE a.cd_field NOT IN (SELECT b.cd_field FROM table_b b); Does the previous query return any row?
